## Installation

You can install the released version of term from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.com) with:

``` r
install.packages("term")
```

And the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
remotes::install_github("poissonconsulting/term")
```

Please note that the 'term' project is released with a
[Contributor Code of Conduct](CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md).
By contributing to this project, you agree to abide by its terms.
